creditline: Gift of Judith Kaufer and Katherin Kaufer Christoffel in memory of their parents, George and Sonya Kaufer
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: curved U-shaped piece of white antler; reclining figure wearing a very tall pointed cap (or ponytail?), with elongated face; legs of figure may be contained in a blanket, or figure may be a merman or mermaid; sled at center bottom being pulled by a whale, porpoise, two seals and a fish; all animals except fish attached to sled by harnesses made of string
title: Hunter (or mermaid/man?) with sled pulled by whale, porpoise, seals, and fish
